content.text:
# Latin American Music Awards of 2016

| next = 2017
}}
The 2nd Annual Latin American Music Awards were held at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, California. It was broadcast live on Telemundo. Lucero was announced as the host on August 31. Banda MS and Yandel led the nominations with six each.
Performances
*CNCO
*Gerardo Ortiz
*Gente de Zona
*Jesse & Joy
*Prince Royce
*Jay Ruiz
*Víctor Manuelle
*Dvicio
*Lucero
*Pitbull
*Sofía Reyes
*Banda MS
*Flo Rida
*Miguel Bosé
*Joey Montana
*Alvaro Soler
*Baby Rasta & Gringo
*Franco de Vita
*La Santa Cecilia
*Becky G
*Nicky Jam
*ChocQuibTown
*LunchMoney Lewis
*Jacob Forever
*Aymee Nuviola
Nominees
The nominations were announced on August 31.
